programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: Ivan travels to Namibia to investigate, catch, and tag suspected man-eating crocodiles.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: At the San Antonio Zoo, public outreach is shaping the modern conservation landscape.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.sub-title: Mountain Lion: Hiding in Plain Sight
programme.desc: Ivan heads to snowy Utah in an attempt to catch and collar the enigmatic mountain lion.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: Elephants are eating crops and threatening the livelihoods of a community in rural Mozambique.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: Ivan teams up with top scientists to assist with southern ground hornbill conservation.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: Giraffe Conservation Foundation takes action against the silent extinction of African giraffes.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.sub-title: Quail: The Health of the Land
programme.desc: Quail populations in Texas are a crucial indicator species for deciphering ecosystem health.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: The rescue and rehabilitation of orphaned chimpanzees from the bushmeat and pet trade.

programme.title: Defenders of the Wild
programme.desc: Join Ivan as he finds out how to protect rhinos from poachers seeking their in-demand horns.

programme.desc: Gadget takes on a tricky two engine classic Mustang and sources a dream project Delorean.

programme.title: Reverend Gadget's Garage
programme.desc: With a myriad of issues and little control, Gadget finally accepts he needs to hire more help.

programme.desc: After parting with his Speedster to make room for more projects, Gadget heads to Burning Man.

programme.sub-title: Faster Than It’s Safe To Go!
programme.desc: A client saves a nostalgic Fiero from junking to electrify it as a gift to his nephew.

programme.desc: An electrified Porsche debuts at a Hollywood movie premiere, and Gadget overhauls an "art car."
